title: Qatar halts role as cease-fire broker while panel warns of famine in Gaza
content: Qatar has paused mediation efforts for a cease-fire in Gaza, saying it would resume only when the parties are serious enough to end “the brutal war.”
summary: Qatar has paused mediation efforts for a cease-fire in Gaza, saying it would resume only when the parties are serious enough to end “the brutal war.”

title: ‘Imminent’ famine likely in northern Gaza, experts warn in alert
content: The IPC Famine Review Committee said it was clear the worst-case scenario its analysts had developed earlier was “now playing out in areas of the northern Gaza Strip.”
summary: The IPC Famine Review Committee said it was clear the worst-case scenario its analysts had developed earlier was “now playing out in areas of the northern Gaza Strip.”

title: Four people held after attacks on Israeli soccer fans in Amsterdam
content: Prime Minister Dick Schoof canceled a trip to U.N. climate talks following the attacks, which erupted around a soccer match between Dutch and Israeli teams.
summary: Prime Minister Dick Schoof canceled a trip to U.N. climate talks following the attacks, which erupted around a soccer match between Dutch and Israeli teams.

title: Hamas should no longer be welcomed in Qatar, U.S. tells Doha
Pentagon to appeal ruling that affirms plea deals for 9/11 defendants
content: A judge’s decision to allow plea deals in three 9/11 cases sets up a confrontation with Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin, who opposes the Guantánamo court ruling.
summary: A judge’s decision to allow plea deals in three 9/11 cases sets up a confrontation with Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin, who opposes the Guantánamo court ruling.

title: Israel striking Lebanon 101 times per day, according to Post analysis
What to know about Trump’s history of support for Israel
Attacks on Israeli soccer fans a ‘black night’ for Amsterdam, mayor says
Canada sees ‘opportunity’ in these mines. Alaskans see a threat.
content: Indigenous people, environmentalists and lawmakers of both parties fear more mining in British Columbia’s Golden Triangle could pollute Alaska’s waterways.
summary: Indigenous people, environmentalists and lawmakers of both parties fear more mining in British Columbia’s Golden Triangle could pollute Alaska’s waterways.

title: Australia is still logging the parks meant to become a koala reserve
content: Australia’s koala population is endangered but efforts to create a new sanctuary are contentious, with environmentalists and the forestry industry at loggerheads.
summary: Australia’s koala population is endangered but efforts to create a new sanctuary are contentious, with environmentalists and the forestry industry at loggerheads.

title: What to know about Trump’s history of support for Israel
content: The former president has promised peace in the Middle East but also told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in October to “do what you have to do.”
summary: The former president has promised peace in the Middle East but also told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in October to “do what you have to do.”

title: U.S. will send contractors to Ukraine to help fix its weapons
content: U.S.-made F-16 fighter jets and Patriot air-defense systems are among the equipment in Ukraine requiring defense contractor support, the Pentagon said.
summary: U.S.-made F-16 fighter jets and Patriot air-defense systems are among the equipment in Ukraine requiring defense contractor support, the Pentagon said.

title: U.N. decries ‘unprecedented level of killing’ in Gaza; Israel condemns Amsterdam attack
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said an attack on Israeli soccer fans in Amsterdam was a “horrific anti-Semitic incident.”
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said an attack on Israeli soccer fans in Amsterdam was a “horrific anti-Semitic incident.”

title: Aid convoy to northern Gaza stopped and looted, U.N. says
Hamas should no longer be welcomed in Qatar, U.S. tells Doha
Attacks on Israeli soccer fans a ‘black night’ for Amsterdam, mayor says
content: Amsterdam’s mayor condemned the attacks on the Israeli fans, some of whom had been chanting anti-Arab slogans, saying there was “no excuse.” Police said five people were sent to the hospital.
summary: Amsterdam’s mayor condemned the attacks on the Israeli fans, some of whom had been chanting anti-Arab slogans, saying there was “no excuse.” Police said five people were sent to the hospital.

title: Elon Musk joins Trump’s call with Ukraine’s Zelensky
content: Elon Musk’s involvement in the conversation between Trump and Zelensky is the latest sign he intends to play a prominent role in the next U.S. administration.
summary: Elon Musk’s involvement in the conversation between Trump and Zelensky is the latest sign he intends to play a prominent role in the next U.S. administration.

title: President-elect Trump tells Palestinian Authority he will work for Middle East peace
Mounting Russian strikes hit Ukraine with casualties across the country
content: At least 14 were killed and a 100 injured in the attacks around the country that also left the building where a European ambassador lives in flames.
summary: At least 14 were killed and a 100 injured in the attacks around the country that also left the building where a European ambassador lives in flames.

title: Fearing Trump tariffs, shoe maker Steve Madden plans to cut China sourcing
content: The maker of trendy footwear expects that within a year, many of its U.S. imports will not be made in China.
summary: The maker of trendy footwear expects that within a year, many of its U.S. imports will not be made in China.

title: Waiting for the North Koreans on the battlefields of the Ukraine war
content: Amid reports that Pyongyang’s troops are on the front lines, speculation is rampant among Ukrainian troops about when the first large-scale clashes will happen.
summary: Amid reports that Pyongyang’s troops are on the front lines, speculation is rampant among Ukrainian troops about when the first large-scale clashes will happen.

title: Prince William says he had his ‘hardest year’ after family cancer diagnoses
content: The prince has opened up about coping with the illnesses of his wife, Catherine, the Princess of Wales, and his father, King Charles, who is still undergoing treatment.
summary: The prince has opened up about coping with the illnesses of his wife, Catherine, the Princess of Wales, and his father, King Charles, who is still undergoing treatment.

title: With Trump’s win, Australia worries AUKUS may come under new scrutiny
content: Australia has already spent billions on the nuclear-powered submarine deal agreed with the Biden administration, and fears President-elect Trump might disrupt that.
summary: Australia has already spent billions on the nuclear-powered submarine deal agreed with the Biden administration, and fears President-elect Trump might disrupt that.

title: China unveils $1.4 trillion stimulus in effort to boost flailing economy
content: The outlook is grim for the world’s second largest economy, with growth slowing and the prospect of a new trade war following Donald Trump’s electoral victory.
summary: The outlook is grim for the world’s second largest economy, with growth slowing and the prospect of a new trade war following Donald Trump’s electoral victory.

title: Israeli fans attacked after soccer match in Amsterdam
In Trump victory, Netanyahu sees himself as ‘the great winner’
Israel Katz, new Israeli defense minister, is longtime Netanyahu ally
As fear of Middle East war grows, more Jewish Americans move to Israel
content: Since the Hamas attack of Oct. 7, 2023, over 11,700 Americans have opened applications to immigrate to Israel. That’s nearly double the number the year before.
summary: Since the Hamas attack of Oct. 7, 2023, over 11,700 Americans have opened applications to immigrate to Israel. That’s nearly double the number the year before.

title: Trump’s victory cements the triumph of the illiberal West
content: Trump’s win was hailed by far-right populists around the world, who were gleeful about the seeming exhaustion of the liberal status quo.
summary: Trump’s win was hailed by far-right populists around the world, who were gleeful about the seeming exhaustion of the liberal status quo.
